select seq_id , partner_id , partner_nm , prd_cd , brand_nm , prd_nm , jan_cd , prd_cnt , prd_unit_prc , tax_incld , tax_rt , std_info , dsku , dasin , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') reg_dt , date_format(upd_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') upd_dt from jaiko_prd_info
seq_id = #{seq_id}
and prd_cd like '%${prd_cd}%'
and prd_nm like '%${prd_nm}%'
and jan_cd like '%${jan_cd}%'
and partner_id = #{partner_id}
upd_dt between date_add(now(), interval -1 day) and now()
order by upd_dt desc, seq_id desc

select seq_id , partner_id , partner_nm , prd_cd , brand_nm , prd_nm , jan_cd , prd_cnt , prd_unit_prc , tax_incld , tax_rt , std_info , dsku , dasin , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') reg_dt , date_format(upd_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') upd_dt from jaiko_prd_info where jan_cd = #{jan_cd}
